tag_list: chauncey-tyrone-richardson, yopro-global, american-airlines, george-mason-university, capella-university, european-young-professionals
overview:
Chauncey Tyrone Richardson, or Ty as he is known is the Founder and CEO of YoPro Global Inc, a community for graduating young professionals.

Ty started his career working for his parents who were both entrepreneurs in Trinidad and then joined American Airlines where he spent the next 14 years in various roles including Head of Business Development for AA Credit Union and Regional Operations Manager for Europe and Asia/Pacific for American Airlines.

Ty left American in December 2012 after running European Young Professionals- Dublin, an informal young professional organization he started in Ireland that brought local and expatriate young professionals together regularly to network, to start YoPro Global in San Francisco. As CEO, Ty is responsible for the start-up, funding and overall direction of the organization.

Ty currently holds a BA in Integrated Studies focused on Advertising and a MA in International Commerce and Public Policy from George Mason University and a PhD in Business & Technology focused on Organizational Management from Capella University.

relationships.title: Regional Operations Manager, Europe & Asia Pacific
